translations: 潦草的字迹，胡乱的涂画
草草地写；乱涂乱画；涂鸦（scribble 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He showed up in his new office in Santa Monica, near Los Angeles, and with his small team started scribbling ideas on the "whiteboard" wallpaper.
sentences.translation: 他来到洛杉矶附近圣塔莫尼卡市的新办公室里，带领着小队人马开始在“白板”墙纸上勾画自己的理念。

sentences.sentence: I spent a lot of time alone, reading and scribbling stories.
sentences.translation: 多数时间我都一个人呆着，看看书，随手写些故事。

sentences.sentence: Early scribbling is one precursor to early writing which can lead to reading.
sentences.translation: 幼儿的涂鸦是一种书写，也是阅读的前兆。
